deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

documentation.text:
@dev Finalize the total debt of the system after the emergency shutdown.
This function should be called after:
- Every positions has undergone `accumulateBadDebt` or `snip` to settle all the debt.
- System surplus must be zero, this means all surplus should be used to settle bad debt already.
- The emergency shutdown cooldown period must have passed.
This total debt will be equivalent to the total stablecoin issued which should already reflect 
the correct value if all the above requirements before calling `finalizeDebt` are satisfied.

@dev Accumulate the deposited stablecoin of the caller into a stablecoinAccumulator to be redeemed into collateral token later
 @param _amount the amount of stablecoin to be accumulated [wad]

accumulateStablecoin(uint256).details: Accumulate the deposited stablecoin of the caller into a stablecoinAccumulator to be redeemed into collateral token later

params._amount: the amount of stablecoin to be accumulated [wad]

cagePool(bytes32).details: Set the cage price of the collateral pool with the latest price from the price oracleaccess: OWNER_ROLE

finalizeDebt().details: Finalize the total debt of the system after the emergency shutdown. This function should be called after: - Every positions has undergone `accumulateBadDebt` or `snip` to settle all the debt. - System surplus must be zero, this means all surplus should be used to settle bad debt already. - The emergency shutdown cooldown period must have passed. This total debt will be equivalent to the total stablecoin issued which should already reflect  the correct value if all the above requirements before calling `finalizeDebt` are satisfied.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

redeemStablecoin(bytes32,uint256).details: Redeem all the stablecoin in the stablecoinAccumulator of the caller into the corresponding collateral token

params._amount: the amount of stablecoin to be redeemed [wad]
